first_para: Natascha Engel (born 9 April 1967) is a German-British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for North East Derbyshire since 2005. She has extensive involvement in the trade union movement and is the current Chair of the Backbench Business Committee. For her work in Parliament she was awarded Parliamentarian of the Year in 2013 by the Political Studies Association.

For her work in Parliament she was awarded Parliamentarian of the Year in 2013 by the Political Studies Association.
full.title: Natascha Engel
